roleset.name: get off of or out of a vehicle
roleset.note: DISEMBARK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disembark' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'embark'. OK, nevermind. (from disembark.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: At the ritzy Fashion Island Shopping Center, the tanned and elegant ladies of this wealthy Southern California beach community disembark from their Mercedes-Benzes and BMWs for another day of exercising their credit cards.
example.arg: At the ritzy Fashion Island Shopping Center
the tanned and elegant ladies of this wealthy Southern California beach community
for another day of exercising their credit cards
